price: 60. Tokkel isin sin abbah baxa yol baahe wayteenik, toysa yi xaqul ambô keexiyya mantuunuuy tu siinil maxaamak yol maamaatinaay yol maxayyoowina keenik iyye.
arabic: فَإِن لَّمۡ تَأۡتُونِي بِهِۦ فَلَا كَيۡلَ لَكُمۡ عِندِي وَلَا تَقۡرَبُونِ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: fa-in lam tatūnī bihi falā kayla lakum ʿindī walā taqrabūni
